"BMI Calculator Free is a free calculator which calculates your Body Mass Index with specific formula
If "Metric" system of measurements is checked, you have to use meters for height and kilograms for weight
If "Standard" system od measurements is checked, you have to use feet for height and pounds for weight
If you like this application plase give it 5 stars on Google Play and share it with friends
